features.featureTitle: Update the Rate Card on-page pricing display (frontend/src/components/RatePricingSection.tsx) to include two additional pricing sections, using English labels and the exact values provided by the user: (1) a "Local Transfer" section with minimum distance and base price plus extra per-km price for SEDAN, SUV, Innova, and CRYSTA; and (2) a "Rental Rate Card" section with package duration+distance and base price plus extra per-hour and extra per-km prices for SEDAN, SUV, Innova, and CRYSTA. Keep the existing per-km One-way/Round-trip pricing and the existing "Additional Information" (driver allowance, minimum coverage) visible as well.
